metadata.name: Morning Light
metadata.description:
Sunrise at the Sandy Point Shoal Lighthouse in the Chesapeake Bay, Maryland. I woke super early the morning to fly the drone not knowing what the sunrise or weather was going to be like. Right after I got to the location the sky just started to light up this bright red color. I immediately put my drone up in the air and I was able to capture this shot. Sometimes it's just a matter of being in the right place at the right time to capture a shot like this. 


Title: Morning Light  
Editions: 50  
Artist: Kevin Olson
